snippet: Toyota took legal action in California this week in its expanding effort to prevent Republic Industries from buying too many of its franchised dealerships.    Toyota Motor Sales USA Inc., the Japanese auto maker's United States sales arm based nea...
lead_paragraph: Toyota took legal action in California this week in its expanding effort to prevent Republic Industries from buying too many of its franchised dealerships. Toyota Motor Sales USA Inc., the Japanese auto maker's United States sales arm based near Los Angeles, petitioned the state's New Motor Vehicle Board to block Republic's planned purchase of Anderson Lexus in Fremont, Calif.
abstract: Toyota petitions California regulators to prevent Republic Industries, owned by H Wayne Huizenga, from purchasing Anderson Lexus; Republic, which refuses to abide by Toyota's limits on multiple ownerships, has in few months become world's largest dealer group (S)

headline.main: Toyota Expands Its Fight Against Republic

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: LEXUS DIVISION OF TOYOTA MOTOR SALES USA
